product_name: Serfas Seca Road Utility Tire - 27 x 1-1/4
long_description: This 27-in. Serfas Seca road tire offers long tread life, puncture resistance and superior performance. Integrated armor casing delivers first-rate puncture resistance. Super hard 70-durometer rubber compound for enhanced tire wear. Dual-density system combines a firm center ridge and a soft outer shoulder for enhanced cornering.
short_description: This 27-in. Serfas Seca road tire offers long tread life, puncture resistance and superior performance.
